metadataAttributes.Title: Deploy a Modern Web App connected to a Cloud Spanner Instance
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This is a self-paced lab that takes place in the Google Cloud console. In this lab you build and deploy a Node.js application connected to a Cloud Spanner instance. The Node.js application is a stock price visualization tool named OmegaTrade. The OmegaTrade application stores stock prices in Cloud Spanner and renders visualizations using Google Charts.
